name: Bouncy Ball (itch) (Burntowl25)
description:
Much like the classic game everyone played when they were younger, you are trying to bounce a ball, without letting it touch the ground. Using a small, shrinking platform (controlled by your mouse) try to get a high-score in this addictive experience

This is my first game and I am pretty proud of how functional it is. Please leave a comment, as I  love criticism I can use to improve future games. 

Thanks for playing!
